items.content_html: Todo App is a simple, efficient, and lightweight task management application built using the FastAPI framework. It allows users to create, read, update, and delete tasks in a to-do list, making it easy to manage daily tasks or project to-do items.

items.content_html: Slack Notify Kit is a lightweight Node.js utility that helps developers send beautifully formatted Slack messages using incoming webhooks. It supports HTML-to-text conversion, code block formatting, message types (info, warning, error), and optional channel overrides. Great for logging, error reporting, and automated alerts in your apps.
items.title: AkshayPanchivala/slack-notify-kit: Slack Notify Kit is a lightweight Node.js utility that helps developers send beautifully formatted Slack messages using incoming webhooks. It supports HTML-to-text conversion, code block formatting, message types (info, warning, error), and optional channel overrides. Great for logging, error reporting, and automated alerts in your apps.

items.content_html: Angular i18n SPA Demo is a lightweight, multilingual Single Page Application built with Angular. Designed as a showcase for Angular's internationalization (i18n) capabilities, this demo highlights best practices for building scalable, localized web applications. The application supports English (en), Dutch (nl), and Serbian (sr),
